name: unittest_html_individual_config
comment:
A unit test library for running groups of tests in a browser, instead of the entire test file. This is especially used for large tests files that have many subtests, so we can mark groups as failing at a finer granularity than the entire test file.

To use, import this file, and call unittest/unittest_html_individual_config.useHtmlIndividualConfiguration at the start of your set sequence. Important constraint: your group descriptions MUST NOT contain spaces.
